projects.title: Firebird
projects.alt: 1967 Chevrolet Camaro SS classic muscle car restoration by BST Classics complete frame-off restoration showcasing professional craftsmanship
projects.story: This stunning 1967 Camaro SS underwent a complete frame-off restoration. We rebuilt the 396 big block engine to factory specifications, restored the 4-speed manual transmission, and refinished the iconic Rally wheels. Every component was meticulously restored to preserve the authentic muscle car experience while ensuring modern reliability.
